summary: Makes all enchantments you put on clothing 50% stronger.
descriptionHtml:
Even if you are an alteration mage using armor spells, a mage build without any armor is still not really a viable option. Shouldn't wearing clothing have some kind of benefit? This mod adds a small change that makes all enchantments you put on clothing 50% stronger than those put on armor.

Requires the Dragonborn DLC.

Also check out my new mod:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74245/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D74245&pUp=1]Nightwielder Spire[/url]!
author: HeirOfTheSeptems
